schema:creator: Nelson, Wendy
schema:description:
__Artist's Statement:__ This art piece is a visual expression in the form of 4" x 6" collage journal that reflects my thoughts feelings and pastimes since sheltering in place. The journal is an ongoing project and includes a poem written by my 11 year old granddaughter for a school assignment.  
 __Participant age:__  Unknown  
 __Category:__  Adult Age 15+: Graphic Art
schema:name: Life in the Time of Covid-19
schema:publisher: UC Davis Library, Archives and Special Collections
